item.description:
As many of you know I have been with The Leukemia and Lymphoma Society's Team in Training for a number of years and we are about to start another season so I figured I'd post the information in case anyone is interested.

The Disney Marathon weekend has something for everyone from a 5k to the Goofy Challenge.  It's also a great destination event since you can combine your run with a family vacation! 

Find out more Wednesday at 6:30pm at Brazi's Italian Restaurant on Long Wharf.

 

http://www.teamintraining.org/ct/firsttimehere/InfoMeetings
item.how_to_find_us: Once at the Restaurant follow signs for TNT
item.name: TNT Season Kick Off for Disney Weekend
